title: Grouping children: some alternatives
creator_credit: Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group and Rob McCubbin
brief_description: Provides information on how five Victorian primary schools make decisions about the grouping of their children into composite, multi-age, family, subject specific, cross-age, and multicultural groupings.
